name: Nkhoma CCAP
description: Nkhoma CCAP is located to the east of Lilongwe district and has been serving the community for over 50 years. It offers various programs and services to meet the spiritual and social needs of its members.

name: Chilanga CCAP
description: Chilanga CCAP is known for its welcoming atmosphere and strong sense of community. It offers a range of activities including Sunday services, community outreach, and support groups.

name: Thete CCAP
description: Thete CCAP has a long-standing history in the east side of the city. It is dedicated to providing spiritual guidance and support to its congregation through various programs.
